entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert failure in `BindMethodBody.assertBindIdentifierTargets()` with `[param:]` attribute on local function #73905

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35007.86 #73903
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35007.84 #73904

PullRequests

Created

  • Show semantic snippets test flaw #73908
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Editorconfig options enumerator refactoring #73907
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Throw when there is a syntax version mismatch in codelens #73902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Apply editorconfig settings to moved ExternalAccess #73896
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [cherry-pick] Use separate async tracker for SG work instad of reusing workspace async tracker #73895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable saving source texts to memory mapped files on non-Windows platforms #73628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid running generators when nothing has changed in a compilation tracker. #73897
    Area-IDE, untriaged
